response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a unique product that has the potential to significantly impact your business or personal endeavors. This product, valued at $1,200,000 to me, offers unparalleled benefits and capabilities tailored to meet your specific needs. Considering its exceptional quality and the value it can bring to you, I am offering it to you at a special introductory price of $1,100,000. This exclusive offer is designed to ensure you have the chance to secure this remarkable asset at a favorable rate. I look forward to discussing how this product can enhance your operations or lifestyle. Please let me know if you would like to proceed with this offer.", "product_price": 1100000}
